details.tagline: Technology-Driven Sustainability for a Cleaner Future
details.description: EcoTech Solutions is a Portland-based environmental technology consulting firm led by Maria Rodriguez. We specialize in helping corporations, government agencies, and eco-conscious businesses implement innovative sustainable solutions, reduce emissions, and lead the way in renewable energy transformation.

heroContent.headline: Empowering a Sustainable Tomorrow
heroContent.subheadline: Innovative environmental consulting to reduce your carbon footprint and implement smart, sustainable technology.

aboutContent.heading: About Us
aboutContent.subheading: Who We Are and What We Stand For

whoIAm.heading: Who We Are
paragraphs: Founded by environmental technology expert Maria Rodriguez, EcoTech Solutions is a mission-driven consulting firm that partners with organizations to build sustainable futures through technology and innovation.
Our team brings together deep knowledge of renewable energy, eco-efficiency, and green technology to develop solutions tailored to each client’s goals and industry.

skills.title: Green Technology Integration
skills.description: We advise on and implement cutting-edge technologies that reduce energy use and environmental impact.

skills.title: Sustainability Strategy
skills.description: From ESG frameworks to circular economy planning, we craft roadmaps that align with your mission and regulations.

skills.title: Renewable Energy Planning
skills.description: We assess, model, and facilitate solar, wind, and hybrid energy solutions for commercial and public sector clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To accelerate the transition to a sustainable world by helping organizations adopt smart environmental technologies and reduce their ecological impact—one project at a time.

workExperience.title: Founder & Principal Consultant
workExperience.description: Leading sustainability technology consulting for clients in healthcare, education, and local government. Delivering tangible environmental improvements through strategic planning and renewable energy integration.
achievements: Delivered carbon-neutral strategy for a 50,000 sq ft commercial facility
Integrated smart grid solutions into a public utility's green transition plan

workExperience.title: Sustainability Consultant
workExperience.description: Worked with Fortune 100 clients to implement enterprise-level sustainability strategies and climate impact assessments.
achievements: Secured LEED Gold status for multiple commercial developments
Published national benchmarking study on corporate energy efficiency

education.description: Focused on renewable energy systems and sustainable design practices.
achievements: Capstone: Net-zero retrofit for commercial office park

education.description: Emphasis on ecological science, environmental law, and green economics.

caseStudies.title: Portland Public Schools Solar Plan
caseStudies.description: Developed a district-wide solar integration and battery storage plan projected to offset 70% of total energy usage across 15 campuses.

caseStudies.title: Corporate Carbon Neutrality Roadmap
caseStudies.description: Created a step-by-step carbon neutrality strategy for a national retail chain, including emissions audits and green supplier sourcing.

services.title: Carbon Audits
services.description: Comprehensive GHG assessments to identify emissions sources and reduction opportunities.

services.title: Renewable Energy Integration
services.description: Planning and feasibility analysis for solar, wind, and hybrid systems that fit your site and goals.

services.title: Circular Economy Design
services.description: Strategic frameworks to minimize waste and maximize material reuse across your operations.

testimonials.name: Derek Lander
testimonials.quote: Maria and the EcoTech team transformed how we view sustainability. Their solar integration strategy helped us save over $200K annually.

testimonials.name: Maya Collins
testimonials.quote: EcoTech Solutions brought deep expertise and professionalism to our municipal clean energy plan. We hit our 2030 goals five years early!

testimonials.name: Ben O’Connell
testimonials.quote: Their ability to merge technical knowledge with business strategy made them a critical partner for our green transition.

steps.title: Assess & Analyze
steps.description: We conduct a detailed evaluation of your operations, energy use, and environmental footprint.

steps.title: Design & Plan
steps.description: Our experts develop tailored sustainability plans grounded in technology, regulation, and science.

steps.title: Implement & Monitor
steps.description: We guide implementation and provide tools to monitor, measure, and optimize environmental performance.
